We offer a basic 3D printing class. This class is intended to get you up and running on our [[Kossel_Clear|Kossel Clear 3D Printer]] and our [[Wanhao Duplicator 4S|Wanhao Duplicator 4S 3D Printer]]. It is not a design or modeling class. 

Follow the link to view the slidedeck [[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-ZJTQLuLlUmTFBiQktrbHF0aG8/view?usp=sharing]].
